amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the ARPA-E account by $50 million and apply the amount to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 192 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for the ARPA-E account by $50 million and apply the amount to the deficit reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggert amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 262 (Roll no. 55).
